data: Ah, you're the come-from-away, aren'tcha?{break}{mood:happy}Welcome, welcome! We've been waitin' such a long time.{break}{mood:laugh}I'd offer ta make ya tea, but me kettle's broke.{break}{mood:like}Oh, where's my manners? I'm Tobin. T-O-B-I-N.{break}{mood:happy}I'se the b'y who catches the fish, as they say!{break}Lovely ta meet ye.

Y'know, they say ye shouldn't mix business and pleasure.{break}{mood:happy}But I love the beach, I do! Even if I spend every bleedin' day here!{break}{mood:like}Ye know... Yer the first person who's ever asked me on a date.{break}Not like I don't have friends, but it never goes any further.{break}{mood:default}I mostly don't mind, ye know. But even I gets lonely.
{mood:happy}A date? Wi' me? Are ye sure?{break}I mean, I would love ta go on a date. Absolutely!{break}{mood:like}I'll be there at 20:00.
Hello!{random}How's it goin'?{random}There y'are!{random}Lovely ta see ye!
Sorry. I'll be out fishin'.{break}{mood:laugh}Trust me, ye don't want to 'ave a date on a fishin' day.
Why do you think that is?
See yas!{random}Mind yerself, now!{random}Fair weather to ye.{random}See ye later!{random}Mind how ye go.
Is there something wrong with you that I should know about?

{mood:laugh}Oh! That's kind of ye to say.{break}{mood:like}I know it's early, but... I'm glad you saw somethin' more in me.{break}{mood:laugh}No pressure, of course! Let's jus' take things slow.{break}{mood:like}Would ye mind if I walked ye home?{break}I want ta make sure ye get back safe.

Good question. I'm not sure.{break}On a sad day, I'd guess that no one thinks I'm... attractive.{break}{mood:laugh}On any other day, I'd say I'm just a bit too friendly, I s'pose.{break}{mood:like}More of a brother-type, y'know?{break}But, ah, enough about me.{break}{mood:happy}Let's get you home, it's gettin' cold!
{mood:happy}Holy mackerel! You caught this yerself?{break}Ye must be quite the fisher. These are tricky lads to catch!

{mood:laugh}No! Of course not.{break}{mood:default}I just think, maybe, that I'm more of a friend-type guy.{break}It's alright if you think so, too.{break}{mood:dislike}Ah... the weather's changin'. We should head back.
{mood:happy}Fish!{break}{mood:like}Thanks fer sharin' yer catch with me.

{mood:like}{npc:down}See that dartin' silvery shape there? That's Bliss.{break}She's my companion. When I come out here, she's always there.{break}{npc:left}She's a Zenfish, y'know.{break}I try not ta catch Zenfish if I can help it, in case it's 'er family.{break}{mood:happy}People don't think fish make good pets... I disagree. I know she remembers me!{break}{mood:like}Here, feed 'er this. Throw it in.
{mood:dislike}Ohh, no. I can't stand the things. Gives me the creeps.{break}I'll give this to Gaiana, if ye don't mind.
Mornin', ducky!{random}Can I get a kiss before I head off?
Maybe she's a human trapped in a fish body.

{mood:sad}Oh, it breaks my heart to see these out of the water.{break}I never catch 'em if I can help it.{break}{mood:default}I'll put it to use, since ye've already caught it... but please don't bring me more.
Doesn't she mind you catching her friends?
That's like being a butcher who's friends with a cow.
{mood:dislike}Maybe it's different where ye're from... But around 'ere, we don't stand people up.{break}Do ye have a good reason, at least?

{mood:laugh}Y'know, I thought that too!{break}{mood:like}I mean, she's so friendly. And so different.{break}I feel like she really listens to me, y'know? I know that sounds nuts.{break}{mood:default}It can get lonely out here. I'm glad I'm not jus' talkin' to meself.{break}{mood:laugh}Don't fear, yer better company than a fish. No offence, Bliss.{break}{mood:like}Shall we head back now?
Mind how ye go, ducky!{random}Love ya, ducky.

{mood:laugh}Ah... We don't talk about it, ta be honest!{break}{mood:like}I think... I think she knows I can get a little lonely out here.{break}I think she's lonely, too. Maybe.{break}{mood:laugh}Or I'm just bein' a weirdo about a fish.{break}{mood:like}Ah... we should head back. See ya, Bliss!
I was just busy and I forgot!

Well... yes an' no.{break}{mood:sad}...List'n, I'm sorry if ye find it all a bit monstrous, the catchin' and eatin'.{break}If that's the case, I don't know that we can really work t'gether.{break}I totally understand if it's not yer bag. But this is me profession.{break}{mood:default}I think I should take ye home. C'mon.
Well, as it turned out, I had a nice evening at the tavern instead.{break}{mood:dislike}But don't stand me up again. It ain't nice.
*yawn* I'm after goin' ta bed early...

D'ye remember Bliss? Me fishy friend?{break}{mood:sad}She's gone. And I don't know if I'll ever find out what 'appened.{break}She could 'ave found someone, or she could be... gone.{break}Haven't seen 'er in days. It's a lot lonelier without 'er.{break}{npc:down}D'ye think I'm a silly old man fer bein' heartbroke over a fish?
{mood:like}Want ta know a secret?{break}...{break}{mood:happy}Today's me birthday.{break}{mood:like}I don't usually celebrate it, but there ye go.
I think she was more than just a fish.
{mood:like}You got this fer me? A birthday present?{break}Oh, it's beautiful...{break}{mood:sad}That's very kind of ye.{break}No, I'm not tearin' up! I got sea water in me eye!
{mood:like}Oh! A birthday present?{break}{mood:dislike}Ohhh.{break}Y'know, me ma taught me, "if ye've got nothin' nice to say, don't say nothin'."{break}...{break}...{break}...
It's cold out there today, so it is.{break}Best find yerself a sweater and a hat.
{mood:dislike}I feel like there's a storm a-brewin'.{break}Best bring in me lobster traps.

{npc:left}{mood:laugh}Now, don't go thinkin' I had a crush on that fish!{break}{mood:default}But yer right. She was company. And she cared.{break}{npc:down}I s'pose I built 'er up to be somethin' more than she was, really.{break}{mood:sad}People don't pay much attention to me, usually.{break}{mood:like}It was nice to 'ave someone... something... that noticed when I was around.{break}{mood:laugh}Ah, I'm gettin' choked up. Sorry.{break}{mood:like}Let's do a date again some time where I'm not broke up over a fish, okay?
{mood:like}Oh, don't you look fancy today.{break}Goin' somewhere, are ye?

{npc:left}Aw, thanks.{break}{mood:sad}I genuinely am torn up about 'er, though.{break}In all me years of fishin', I never 'ad one pay attention to me like 'er.{break}{mood:default}But... well. Maybe that's why she's gone, eh?{break}{mood:like}Because... because you're here. And you pay attention to me.{break}Maybe she was waitin' for someone like you ta come along.{break}{mood:laugh}Ah, I'm gettin' choked up. Sorry.{break}{mood:like}Let's do a date again some time where I'm not broke up over a fish, okay?
{mood:sad}The fish ain't bitin' today.{break}Not much I can do about it, I s'pose.

{npc:left}{mood:sad}I don't blame ye, I s'pose.{break}She was somethin' special, though.{break}Listen, I'm sorry, but... I think I need ta be alone, tonight.{break}Sorry to cut the date short, but you don't wanna be around me like this.{break}{mood:default}Let's do this again some other time, okay?
Oh, I would kill for a cuppa coffee.{break}{mood:laugh}Not literally, fear not. Yer not in danger!
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet
{mood:happy}Say, if ye've ever got a surplus of fish, I'll happily take 'em!

...{break}{mood:sad}I'm sorry about before. All the stuff wi' Bliss.{break}I realised, after ye left... I musta sounded like a right weirdo.{break}{mood:default}Listen, I promise I'm a normal guy. Sure, I talks to fish, but that's just me bein' silly.{break}{mood:sad}I really... I don't want ta scare ye off.{break}This is why I don't tell people about the stuff I gets up ta!
Are ye askin' me ta be yer first mate?{break}{mood:laugh}Jus' kiddin', I'll stop wi' the nautical references.{break}{mood:like}But... does this mean ye want ta go steady?
{mood:like}Sunday's a great day fer seein' friends.
I like you. You don't need to change for me.
I like a man who's not afraid to be sensitive.
Are you still talking about that fish?!
{mood:love}I was jus' about ta ask ye the same thing.{break}{mood:happy}As long as yer serious, yes!
Make sure yer fishin' in different spots.{break}Ocean, lakes, ponds... they've all got different types o' fish!

{mood:like}Ye... ye do? Really?{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe you're as weird as I am, then!{break}{mood:like}Not that I'm complainin'.{break}Yer... yer a really good thing for the island.{break}{mood:happy}And yer a good thing fer me, too.{break}{mood:like}C'mon, let's head back. It's about ta rain!
{mood:dislike}Ah... this must be a prank where ye come from, then.

{mood:like}Well, there's a relief!{break}{mood:default}Ye really don't mind the whole... fish saga?{break}And ye promise yer not just bein' nice?{break}{mood:like}Good ta hear it. Genuinely.{break}{mood:sad}I was thinkin' I'd blown it with ye...{break}When I realised I was more afraid o' losin' you than Bliss, well...{break}{mood:laugh}Heh, I'm just glad ye didn't swim off.{break}{mood:like}C'mon, let's head home. I can smell the rain about to tip it down.
Did ye need somethin' from me?

{npc:down}{mood:sad}Ah, sorry. I knew it'd bothered ye.{break}I won't talk about 'er again, I promise.{break}It was just a silly little story from a weird, lonely fisherman.{break}Pay me no mind.{break}{mood:default}I've got to head back now, but, ah... you feel free ta stay.
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet
What's the best fish ye've caught lately?{break}I'm after a bit o' pizzafish, meself.
Ah, sorry. I think I'll have ta turn ye down.{break}{mood:like}Don't get me wrong, yer lovely.{break}I think I just want ta get ta know ye more, first.

Y'might think me parents were what got me into fishin', but that's not so.{break}{mood:laugh}Me dad HATED fishin'. Hated fish, too.{break}{mood:like}He was more of a meat 'n' potatoes man.{break}But I loved it. I'd go out on the water and all me cares would wash away.{break}I likes bein' alone, see. I'm good at it.
Have you ever fished WITH someone?
I do love a good, bracing wind. Wakes up the senses.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a grass baracelet
What's it like on them islands, then?
Wow, okay, I can take the hint.
Ah, where'd ye get yer hands on a grass bracelet?{break}{mood:awkward}Hold on... is this for me? Are ye breakin' up wi' me?
{mood:sad}I'm feelin' a bit down today, so I am.

{mood:laugh}...Y'know, I don't think I ever have.{break}{mood:like}I wonder if it'd be the same... the serenity, the comfort.{break}{mood:happy}Well, since yer a fisher too, yer always welcome to come wi' me!{break}{mood:like}We can just sit in companionable silence.{break}{mood:awkward}Oh fish sticks, look at the time. I gotta be up at dawn!{break}{mood:like}C'mon, I'll walk ye home.
The sea's a cruel mistress, so she is.

Ah, sure. Everyone gets lonely.{break}But I'm used to it. Been this way a long time.{break}{mood:happy}I talks to the fish, anyway! Keeps me from goin' mad.{break}{mood:laugh}I will concede that talkin' to fish might actually be a sign that I HAVE gone mad.{break}{mood:like}Oh, here, lemme get the bill. I'll walk ye home, too!
Is that what this is for?!
I can't wait fer the weekend.{break}Lookin' forward to kickin' off me shoes!

{mood:awkward}Ah, no! That's not what I meant...{break}{mood:sad}{npc:down}Ah, fish sticks. I'm sorry.{break}Like I said, I'm alone a lot. I ferget how to interact wi' people.{break}{npc:left}Come on, I'll take ye home. I messed this one up...
{mood:sad}I'm sorry ta hear ye feel that way. Was it somethin' I said?{break}...I hope we can still be friends some day.
{mood:laugh}Hahaha, ye doorknob.{break}Put that thing away before ye hurt someone!

-this massive wave, the size of me house twice over...{break}{mood:laugh}CRASH! Down on the hull. Near ripped me boat in two, it did.{break}{mood:like}Thought I was done fer.{break}Lucky fer me, I washed up on the shore a few hours later...{break}And d'ye know what the last thing I'd thought of was?
My arms are right sore today. An' me hands are cold, too!
Alright there?{break}I was jus' wonderin' if yer plannin' ta watch the fireworks t'night.{break}{mood:happy}If ye are, I'd be honoured ta be yer date!
Oh, sorry, did I interrupt ye?
How boring this story would be?
I'm usin' socks for gloves right now.{break}{mood:laugh}Don't fret, they're clean socks.

{mood:laugh}Ha ha, no! Good guess, though.{break}{mood:like}It was me laundry. How boring is that?!{break}I realised that I had to start livin' a life that was worth losin'.{break}{mood:happy}And, well, as chance would have it... that was shortly before you turned up.{break}{mood:laugh}Enough soppy stuff! I've gotta get back.{break}{mood:like}As chance would have it... I've got another load of laundry to hang up!

{mood:laugh}Oh, I wish. No!{break}{mood:like}It was me laundry. How boring is that?!{break}I realised that I had to start livin' a life that was worth losin'.{break}{mood:happy}And, well, as chance would have it... that was shortly before you turned up.{break}{mood:laugh}Enough soppy stuff! I've gotta get back.{break}{mood:like}As chance would have it... I've got another load of laundry to hang up!
Ah, yer the best kind, so's ye are.{break}{mood:happy}Let's go watch somethin' blow up.

{mood:angry}Well now! I was only tellin' ye the story to get to a point.{break}{mood:dislike}The point bein', I decided in that moment ta change my life.{break}Didn't want the last thing I thought before I died to be "I need to dry me washin'."{break}But I can see I'm borin' ye.{break}Let's just call it a day there, shall we?
I'm dyin' fer a cup o' tea.

{mood:like}Have I telled ye about me penpal?{break}Her name's Wyatt. She lives over yonder on another island.{break}We used ta be real-life pals, but she moved away wi' her wife a few years back.{break}I tells 'er about me day, about what she's missin'.{break}She's the only person I really keep in touch with from the old days.{break}{mood:happy}You must have tons of people from your hometown like that.
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest)
Yeah. Honestly, it was scary to leave them behind.

{mood:happy}Aw, hello, little Spirit!{break}{mood:like}What a beauty y'are. So handsome. I'll be takin' good care of ye.{break}{mood:happy}Thanks a bunch, Alchemist!{break}{mood:like}Say, I just finished workin' on a new type of fishin' lure... ye should come by and pick one up!
I miss them, but I'm glad to be here.

{mood:like}Ah, ye found me a Spirit companion already?{break}{mood:happy}Hello, little guy!{break}{mood:dislike}...Ow. He bloody bit me.{break}{mood:laugh}I think maybe this ain't the companion for me. Keep tryin', though!
{mood:like}Well, make sure ta settle in! Spring here's a long one.{break}{mood:laugh}At least, so I hear. I've never really been off the island!

Ye don't say? I don't blame ye.{break}{mood:like}I appreciate the honesty. I've never moved so far away.{break}I can't even imagine how hard it must be.{break}Ye leave it all behind, start afresh, on yer own...{break}Yer pretty brave. I hope ye can find or build a home here, too.{break}{mood:laugh}I'd certainly miss ye if you went away!{break}{mood:love}Say... let's walk back home the slow way tonight.
{mood:happy}Ah, thanks fer the help, Alchemist!{break}{mood:like}Here's a little somethin' fer yer hard work.{break}{mood:laugh}Yer welcome to spend it on lures if ye like!
{npc:up}See that constellation up yonder?{break}That's the Fisher's Guide.{break}{mood:like}Shows ye where's north. Helps ye sail home.

{mood:like}Of course ye do!{break}{mood:laugh}I'd be suspicious if ye didn't!{break}{mood:like}I've never done anythin' like that. Never left this island, really.{break}Wyatt asked me ta come with 'er, but I didn't.{break}I don't regret it. I love it here. But I do wonder...{break}{npc:up}*ding ding ding*{break}{mood:happy}{npc:left}...It's last call. We should wrap up.
{mood:like}I love fish. Can't get enough of 'em.{break}Are ye into fishin' yerself? Tell us if ye need help.

{mood:dislike}Oh! Well, I can't say I blame ye for movin' then.{break}{mood:default}But I got the impression ye came from a bigger island.{break}Was there really no one ye felt close to?{break}No, no, that's... that's not that weird, no. It's just...{break}{npc:up}*ding ding ding*{break}{npc:left}...Ah. It's last call. We should head home.
Make sure yer prepared fer any foul weather we get.{break}It's much worse out 'ere on the small islands.
It's a right good day for bein' out.

List'n... I know yer new here. Well, newISH.{break}And I know we 'aven't been on a ton of dates.{break}So... I hope this isn't too forward to ask, but...{break}Have ye, erm... Have ye been on dates with anyone... else?{break}{mood:laugh}Ye don't 'ave ta answer.{break}Actually, jus' ignore me. None o' my business...
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry and all conditions are met
{mood:sad}Aw, heck. I was gonna dry me laundry.{break}Best hope for a dry day tomorra.
{mood:like}Is that what I think it is? Are ye proposin' ta me?
Gaiana came ta watch me fish earlier.{break}{mood:laugh}Learned the hard way that she hates fish. She almost fell in the water!
{mood:dislike}Didja see them blindin' lights last night?{break}Kept me awake fer hours. Thought it was an invasion.
{mood:like}I'd love to 'ave a chinwag, but the fish are callin'!

I don't?{break}{mood:like}Well... I'll take yer word fer it.{break}List'n, I know it ain't partic'larly modern, but...{break}I s'pose I jus' like ta know that I mean somethin' ta someone.{break}{mood:laugh}Plus, well... I 'aven't really dated much before. Or... at all.{break}Please don't think there's somethin' wrong wi' me!{break}{mood:default}I'm jus'... it jus' ain't happ'nd fer me before.{break}An' I want it ta be real.{break}...{break}{mood:laugh}Well, I reck'n I've 'ad enough ta drink, now!{break}{mood:like}Let's go home before I spill all me secrets.
{mood:laugh}I can't believe that's how ye decided to ask. I love ye, I do.{break}{mood:love}And yes. I'll marry ye.
{mood:like}Ye're lookin' very... handsome today.{break}Did ye change somethin'? New hair?{break}Either way, I likes it.

I, uh... I s'pose that makes sense.{break}I jus' didn't realise there were... others.{break}I'm somewhat old-fashioned, I s'pose.{break}Especially since... well, since you're... my... first.{break}{npc:right}I might, uh... I might need ta think this through a bit.{break}{mood:like}{npc:left}It's alright, I'm not endin' this, I promise.{break}{mood:default}I jus' haveta... sort me feelings out. Like I said... it's all new ta me.{break}Sorry. I'll see y'around.
{mood:sad}Aw. S'pose I'll just... go on my way, then.
If ye catch any Zenfish... Jus' don't tell me.{break}I won't begrudge ye the catch.{break}But I always throw 'em back.{break}I'm a softie for Zenfish, so's I am.

{mood:sad}Oh.{break}{mood:awkward}...Ah, I know I shouldn't...{break}...{break}{mood:sad}Look, it's just... I'm... old-fashioned. When it comes ta... love.{break}Sorry. I know it ain't ideal. Or modern.{break}But I... I don't think I'd 'ave taken it this far, if... if I knew there'd be others.{break}{mood:default}...I'm sorry, I think I'm gonna need some time ta meself.{break}I think I needs ta figure out how I feel about all this.{break}{mood:sad}I s'pose I shouldn't 'ave assumed I was special.{break}{mood:default}G'night, fer now.
{mood:like}I'll see ye in the tavern tonight, will I?{break}{mood:happy}Don't tell Ossono, but I might bring somethin' a little extra.{break}I make me own moonshine sometimes. Shhh.
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet
{mood:laugh}I've got an awful tan from fishin' in the sun.{break}{mood:like}Ye can see the line where my hat is! I'll just have ta keep it on.
{mood:like}Sorry ta let ye down, but I think it's a wee bit too soon for that.{break}Let's get ta know one another a bit more.
I'd love ta take the weekend off, but fish don't.

All the time I spends out on the water...{break}{mood:laugh}I almost never get ta actually be IN it. It's alright!{break}{mood:like}And, ah, since we're alone... I gots a question.{break}Alright. So. Be honest wi' me...{break}What d'ye see in me?{break}I mean, what d'ye like about me?

{mood:happy}Ah, congrats ta ye both! Ye're a gorgeous couple, so y'are.{break}Y'know, in my family, our wedding tradition was to hide a fish in the bride or groom's outfit. I'm... glad ya didn't do that.
{mood:dislike}It's bleedin' hot out today.{break}{mood:default}Oh, it's the first day of summer, ain't it?{break}{mood:laugh}That'll be why.
It's me birthday on the 22nd.{break}{mood:laugh}I'm just lettin' ye know, that's all!
{mood:love}Want to get out of here, my love?
{mood:laugh}Feel free to bring me a beer or two while I work, eh?

...{break}...{break}{mood:laugh}Well, heck. I don't know what ta say ta that.{break}{mood:happy}No one's ever said anythin' like that ta me before.{break}{mood:laugh}Is the water gettin' to yer brain?{break}{mood:like}Sorry, that's me tryin' ta deflect sincerity with humour. Shut up, Tobin.{break}What I means ta say is... yer somethin' special.{break}{mood:laugh}Now, not ta ruin the moment, but I think I'm boilin' like a lobster 'ere.{break}{mood:like}Shall we get out and dry off?
{mood:happy}Don't you look like the cat that's got the cream!{break}{mood:like}I s'pose yer 'avin a good day, then, eh?{break}{mood:laugh}Give us some of that luck! I could do with a good day, too!

{mood:laugh}Ha ha ha! Ye don't say!{break}{mood:happy}Well, that's a relief. Can't do much about changin' it, can I?{break}{mood:like}But genuinely... whatever it is ye see in me, I'm glad ye see it.{break}I would love ta see meself the way you see me.{break}{mood:happy}Now, not ta ruin the moment, but I think I'm boilin' like a lobster 'ere.{break}{mood:like}Mind if I get out and dry off?
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
I've gotta go pick my new fishin' rod up from Ferra's this week.{break}{mood:like}She's a star, that one.

Ah.{break}Well.{break}{mood:sad}I s'pose that makes sense.{break}{mood:happy}I mean, if I can't tell what me good points are, how can you?{break}{mood:sad}Heh.{break}{mood:default}I think I might get out now. Quite warm.{break}I'll walk ye home, if ye want ta get out too?
If ye find out what them lights in the distance are, let us know, eh?

I do love a good celebration, I do.{break}{mood:laugh}I just wish it wasn't a celebration for "that time we all almost got sucked into a rift in space and time". Right scary stuff!{break}{mood:like}Ya did great, though. Love ya.
{mood:love}Well, don't you look gorgeous tonight!{break}I really enjoyed our last date, y'know.

D'ye remember what I asked ye last time we were 'ere?{break}{mood:like}I asked ye what ye liked most about me.{break}And, well... the truth is, I also want ta ask ye...{break}{mood:sad}What's me worst quality? The most offputtin' bit?
{mood:angry}Them bleedin' lights were back last night!{break}{mood:dislike}Tell me ye've seen 'em, and I'm not goin' mad.
{mood:like}That's the unmistakeable smell of a freshly-cooked Tigerfish 'n' Chips, ain't it?{break}{mood:happy}It's my absolute favourite. Thanks!
{mood:love}I've 'ad tw... three... no, FOUR beers.{break}Me accent gets much ssstrong'r when I'm tipsy.
The hat. The hat that you wear everywhere. Including here.
Maybe we should come up with an explanation for them strange lights.{break}{mood:laugh}I'm always sayin' we need some new folklore in these parts.

{mood:laugh}Well, I'm glad I never fished in the hot spring.{break}{mood:awkward}I don't want to think about what the Great Spirit might have done to me...{break}{mood:like}Well, enough about that. Ye want to spend the festival with me?
{mood:happy}Ahhh, ye found us!{break}{mood:like}I was jus' about ta get another round.{break}Although maybe... we've had enough... *hic*

{mood:laugh}Ooof, right ta the bone.{break}{mood:default}Y'know, yer right.
